title: Enhancing Service Quality Competency: Microeconomics Mobile Learning via ADDIE Model-Based Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic economics concepts at the high school level
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain core microeconomics concepts (demand-supply model, consumer theory, producer theory) via mobile app with over 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze real-world economic cases using PBL methods and propose policy alternatives through app-based simulation tools
Learners can complete economics problem-solving projects through collaboration with peers using interactive mobile app features
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
